experiences.name: Hamal Strayhorn
experiences.description: Hamal Strayhorn shares his story and illustrates how students can take the next steps by being open with each other, as well as themselves. Spending 14 years in higher education administration, Hamal has played an imperative role in residence life, social justice, and diversity on Montclair State University's campus.

experiences.name: Joel Penney
experiences.description: Dr. Joel Penney specializes in new media, critical/cultural studies, and political communication and theory. His research focuses on the uses of participatory and digital media for social and political advocacy.

experiences.name: Mohammad Naseer Malikzai
experiences.description: Dr. Malikzai shares his experience pursuing medicine, working with the UN, and transitioning to public health studies in the US.

experiences.name: Abby Lillethun
experiences.description: Dr. Lillethun shares her experience in theatre design, costume studio management, and academic program development.

experiences.name: Peter King
experiences.description: Peter King, Esq. shares his journey in law, from real estate to intellectual property, and reflects on how personal values shape career paths.

experiences.name: Faith Taylor
experiences.description: Faith Taylor discusses her career in Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and marketing, and the importance of resilience and positivity.

experiences.name: Joe Amditis
experiences.description: Joe Amditis, Associate Director of the Center for Cooperative Media, discusses journalism, political science, and international law.

experiences.name: Thomas Miller
experiences.description: Thomas Miller discusses his evolution from accounting to sales to leading a tech company in the legal industry.
